com.hcl.domino.admin.idvault

Interface IdVault


  • public interface IdVault
    Access to all id and cert operations

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  IdVault.IDAccessCallback<T>
      Callback interface to work with an opened ID
      static class  IdVault.IdFlag
      Flags of a User ID
      static interface  IdVault.SyncResult

    • Method Detail

      • extractUserIdFromVault

        String extractUserIdFromVault(String userName,
                              String password,
                              Path idPath,
                              String serverName)
        Will contact the server and locate a vault for userName.
        Then extract the ID file from the vault and write it to idPath.

        If successful returns with the vault server name.
        Parameters:
        userName - Name of user whose ID is being put into vault - either abbreviated or canonical format
        password - Password to id file being uploaded to the vault
        idPath - Path to where the download ID file should be created or overwritten
        serverName - Name of server to contact
        Returns:
        the vault server name
        Throws:
        DominoException - in case of problems, e.g. ERR 22792 Wrong Password

      • getUserIdFromVault

        UserId getUserIdFromVault(String userName,
                          String password,
                          String serverName)
        Will contact the server and locate a vault for userName.
        Then downloads the ID file from the vault and store it in memory.
        Parameters:
        userName - Name of user whose ID is being put into vault - either abbreviated or canonical format
        password - Password to id file being uploaded to the vault
        serverName - Name of server to contact
        Returns:
        the in-memory user id
        Throws:
        DominoException - in case of problems, e.g. ERR 22792 Wrong Password

      • getUserIdWithToken

        UserId getUserIdWithToken(Object token,
                          String serverName)
        Will contact the server and retrieves the UserId associated with the provided implementation-specific token.
        Parameters:
        token - the token to use to retrieve the ID. The class of the token depends on the available vault provider implementations
        serverName - the name of the server to contact
        Returns:
        the in-memory user ID
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - when no provider can be found to handle token
        Since:
        1.0.19

      • putUserIdIntoVault

        String putUserIdIntoVault(String userName,
                          String password,
                          Path idPath,
                          String serverName)
        Will open the ID file name provided, locate a vault server for user userName, upload the ID file contents to the vault, then return with the vault server name.
        Parameters:
        userName - Name of user whose ID is being put into vault - either abbreviated or canonical format
        password - Password to id file being uploaded to the vault
        idPath - Path to where the download ID file should be created or overwritten
        serverName - Name of server to contact
        Returns:
        the vault server name
        Throws:
        DominoException - in case of problems, e.g. ERR 22792 Wrong Password

      • putUserIdIntoVault

        String putUserIdIntoVault(String userName,
                          String password,
                          UserId userId,
                          String serverName)
        Will locate a vault server for user userName and upload the specified ID contents to the vault, then return with the vault server name.
        Parameters:
        userName - Name of user whose ID is being put into vault - either abbreviated or canonical format
        password - Password to id file being uploaded to the vault
        userId - user id
        serverName - Name of server to contact
        Returns:
        the vault server name
        Throws:
        DominoException - in case of problems, e.g. ERR 22792 Wrong Password

      • syncUserIdWithVault

        IdVault.SyncResult syncUserIdWithVault(String userName,
                                       String password,
                                       Path idPath,
                                       String serverName)
        Will open the ID file name provided, locate a vault server, synch the ID file contents to the vault, then return the synched content. If successful the vault server name is returned.
        Parameters:
        userName - Name of user whose ID is being put into vault - either abbreviated or canonical format
        password - Password to id file being uploaded to the vault
        idPath - Path to where the download ID file should be created or overwritten
        serverName - Name of server to contact
        Returns:
        sync result

      • resetUserPasswordInVault

        void resetUserPasswordInVault(String server,
                              String userName,
                              String password,
                              int downloadCount)
        Resets an ID password. This password is required by the user when they recover their ID file from the ID vault.
        Parameters:
        server - Name of server to contact to request the password reset. Can be NULL if executed from a program or agent on a server. Does NOT have to be a vault server. But must be running Domino 8.5 or later.
        userName - Name of user to reset their vault id file password.
        password - New password to set in the vault record for pUserName.
        downloadCount - (max. 65535) If this user's effective policy setting document has "allow automatic ID downloads" set to no, then this parameter specifies how many downloads the user can now perform. If downloads are automatic this setting should be zero.

      • changeIdPassword

        void changeIdPassword(Path idPath,
                      String oldPassword,
                      String newPassword)
        This function changes the password in the specified ID file.
        You can use this function to change the password in a user's id, a server's id, or a certifier's id.

        Multiple passwords are not supported.
        Parameters:
        idPath - path to the ID file whose password should be changed
        oldPassword - old password in the ID file. This parameter can only be NULL if there is no old password. If this parameter is set to "", then ERR_BSAFE_NULLPARAM is returned
        newPassword - new password on the ID file. If this parameter is NULL, the password is cleared. If the specified ID file requires a password and this parameter is NULL, then ERR_BSAFE_PASSWORD_REQUIRED is returned. If this parameter is set to "", then ERR_BSAFE_NULLPARAM is returned. If the specified ID file is set for a minimum password length and this string contains less than that minimum, then ERR_REG_MINPSWDCHARS is returned.

      • checkIdPassword

        void checkIdPassword(Path idPath,
                     String password)
        The method tries to open the ID with the specified password. If the password is not correct, the method tries a DominoException
        Parameters:
        idPath - id path
        password - password
        Throws:
        DominoException - e.g. ERR 6408 if password is incorrect

      • getUsernameFromId

        String getUsernameFromId(Path idPath)
        This function will extract the username from an ID file.
        Parameters:
        idPath - id path
        Returns:
        canonical username

      • openUserIdFile

        <T> T openUserIdFile(Path idPath,
                     String password,
                     IdVault.IDAccessCallback<T> callback)
        Opens an ID file and returns an in-memory handle for signing (Document.sign(UserId, boolean)) and using note encrypting (Document.copyAndEncrypt(UserId, java.util.Collection) / Document.decrypt(UserId)).
        Type Parameters:
        T - optional result type
        Parameters:
        idPath - id path on disk
        password - id password
        callback - callback code to access the opened ID; we automatically close the ID file when the callback invocation is done
        Returns:
        optional computation result

      • isIdInVault

        boolean isIdInVault(String userName,
                    String server)
        Checks if the ID vault on the specified server contains an ID for a user
        Parameters:
        userName - user to check
        server - server
        Returns:
        true if ID is in vault

      • getIdFlags

        Set<IdVault.IdFlag> getIdFlags()
        Returns flags for the ID that is active for the current process
        Returns:
        flags

      • getIDFlags

        Set<IdVault.IdFlag> getIDFlags(UserId userId)
        Returns flags for the specified ID file
        Parameters:
        userId - user id, use null for the ID that is active for the current process
        Returns:
        flags
